name: Phantasy Star Portable 2
description:
Phantasy Star Portable 2 is an action-RPG game developed by Alfa System. It came out on 03-12-2009. SEGA published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Phantasy Star Portable 2 on PSP. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store.
It was produced by Satoshi Sakai and Tetsuya Sasaki. It was directed by Yuya Kimura. Fumie Kumatani, Hideaki Kobayashi and Kenichi Tokoi scored the game.
